description: Last day to submit Pass/No Credit for Summer term I and III
Last day of classes for Summer I and III. Exams to be given in class
Fall Semester Classes Begin
Official date of August graduation; diplomas mailed to students after final clearance is completed in September. Degree recipients may take part in the May 2025 Commencement ceremony.

Columbus Day/Indigenous Peoples' Day. No classes.
Consultation weeks. Advisement for Spring 2025 registration. Students should consult with their faculty advisors

Reading/Study days. Instructors can schedule no exams nor require any student work expectations on these days.
